features: [Professional Chef's Knife] This PAUDIN kitchen knife is suitable for cutting bread, vegetables, fillets or meats etc, and is also suitable for home and professional use. Cutting like a master chef will bring you more joy in the kitchen.

[Multi-Functional Chef Knife] This 8 inch chef knife can easily handle your daily chores in kitchen of chopping, slicing, mincing and dicing fruits, vegetables and several meat varieties including fish, chicken and beef etc. It truly is the all-around cooking knife.

[Ultra Sharp Knife] For any meat knife sharpness is the most important feature and at PAUDIN we ensure to provide you our best sharp knives in the market. The thickness of this kitchen knife is 2mm, which is ideal to do the job well. Hand polished by craftsman with decades of experience to ensure long-lasting sharpness.

[Ergonomically Wood Handle] This PAUDIN chef knife has a blade that is integrated with a soft and comfortable handle which gives you the perfect grip. The ergonomic shape gives you the right balance between the handle and the thin blade, ensuring ease of movement.

[Best Design & Customer Service] This knife has a blade that is special waved pattern is particularly striking (5Cr15Mov stainless steel kitchen knives, not real Damascus). We offer 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK policy. PAUDIN knife provides a lifetime against defects in material and workmanship.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Superior German Steel Chef Knife that Gives You a Reason to Enjoy Cooking This professional 8 inch chef knife can easily handle your daily kitchen tasks of chopping, slicing, mincing and dicing of fruits, vegetables, and several meat varieties. It truly is the all-around cooking knife.

Ultra-Sharp German stainless steel with 56 Rockwell hardness and only 15-degree edge at the 0.25mm blade ensure the long-lasting sharpness of this PAUDIN chef knife. Ultra-Durable Made of German steel 5Cr15MoV, the blade is durable and has a long life. The superb alloy prevents dulling and rust and maintains the original sharpness through years of use. Balance, Cut Effortless The balanced handle with ergonomic design gives you effortless cuts of meats, fish, sushi, vegetables and fruits. Premium Gift Box Beautiful black color magnetic gift box to make the knife well-storage, it is an ideal gift item for family or friends, holiday or housewarming.
* Hand wash recommend - no dishwasher. * Do not use Paudin knives on bones, joints, or frozen foods. * Most importantly- to avoid rust, it should be wiped dry. * Dish detergent can be used.

PAUDIN STORY Enjoy Cooking with Paudin The Paudin company, established in 2017, is a high-growth, global, and innovative home-life brand. Our company was founded on the belief that the kitchen knife is a hero that accompanies us in significant life events: whether it is a celebration of a family member birthday or a lively housewarming party, we maintain a clear commitment to making products that our customers trust for life’s most important moments. Around 100,000 chief chefs and home chefs worldwide love PAUDIN kitchen knives and highly recommend them as the-must-to-have in your kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this knife so much! Love the heaviness of it it’s perfect not too light not heavy! The handle is so nice and so easy on the wrist! Definitely my favorite piece. Well worth the money! Very sturdy and very easy to use! Love the blade cover very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knife overall
reviews.reviewText: I'm pretty picky about kitchen knifes. Over the years I've collect many knifes in the kitchen and still haven't settled with my favorite one. Recently one of my friends recommended this Paudin 8" chef's knife. From the picture, I like the wood grain design etched on the blade, which makes it so unique. So I decided to give it a try. The $25.99 price tag (after a$10 coupon, maybe they're running a promotion?) is very reasonable, so it won't go wrong even if it is not as good as I expected. Well, this product acctually really exceeded my expectation when I received it and got hold to it.Its weight gives me very nice solid feel, but not too heavy. The blade and handle are very well balanced. The handle is smooth and very comfortble to hold. The edge feels so sharp to the touch, so I decided to test it. I put a stack of 20 pages of printer paper and tried to slice cut a half inch corner off. To my surprise, I didn't have to do a slicing motion, just press down and the stack of paper got cut through eazily. That's really beyond my expection. I then used it to cut meat and veggie. The knife felt so sharp making all the cutting so eazy. And the curve of the edge feels just right. Well, there is only one minor issue with this product, same as all the knife that I have, the back of the knife is square and clean. But I have a habbit to press on the back of the knife during cutting, especially the closer to the handle part. I would like a knife that has rounded edge at the back near the handle, though I haven't seen one so far.I don't normally write a product review, unless I really like or really hate the product. This time is the former, have to share the good experience with people. To summarize, this is well made kitchen knife with high quarlity. I will use it as my main kitchen knife now. Will see how long it will keep this sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This should be in the Louvre
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my purchase, but I think I made a mistake in buying this knife. I wanted a solid, all-purpose, high quality, Western-style chef's knife. What I got was that, and a piece of art that is just too beautiful to risk using. It would feel like hanging your laundry on Michelangelo's Pieta, or using a limited edition Lord of the Rings to press garlic. Don't get me wrong, this blade is solid, heavy without being overbearing, insanely sharp, ergonomic, and an overall pleasure to use...but it's just so PRETTY! I want to put it in a case over my mantel. The Damascus marbling is gorgeous, the bolster is perfect for a pinch grip, the balance is spot-on, it goes through veggies without any effort (I've had dreams of potato-chopping with more effort) and it does the heavy lifting like Arnold in his prime. I've only used it for a few days, but it seems to hold its edge very well, with just a little use of a honing rod. I know eventually the newness will wear off and this will become my favorite tool; but for now, I just like looking at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars As described..beautiful knife.
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift so won't have a chance to use but I did get to handle it. Razor sharp..beautiful wood handle and Damascus blade. Magnet latch on the box is nice. I would buy again. My son LOVED it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent price, great knife!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this knife after one of my Sous chef coworkers recommended it to me. I’m glad I did! I enjoy cooking, but when it comes to chopping vegetables and the like, I needed something better than what I was using previously. This does the job! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: nice handlegood steelperfect lengthrecommended by a hobby chef

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Man, this knife! Holy crap, is amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I've never owned a premium knife like this one. I thought I had an excellent chefs knife, until I used this one. The difference is night & day. This thing slices through anything with the greatest of ease. Worth every penny. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have absolutely nothing negative to say about this knife. It came packaged in a very nice box. Very good weight. Well-shaped handle and extremely sharp blade. I've owned knives that are more than twice the price of this one and it is just as good. You won't be disappointed.
Great for the price would buy again
Very sharp, cuts well, easy to handle

reviews.reviewTitle: Die Qualität ist definitiv den Preis wert
reviews.reviewText: Scharfes, schlankes Messer, das sehr gut in der Hand liegt und gut zu bewegen ist.Ich verwende es hauptsächlich zum Obst schneiden und bin (bei dem Preis) sehr zufrieden. Kommt in einer sehr ansprechenden Geschenkverpackung.

Die Lieferung erfolgte sehr schnell. Ich bin von dem Messer begeistert. Ich verwende es täglich zur Verarbeitung von Obst und Gemüse z.B Zwiebeln und Knoblauch schneiden genau wie verschiedene Obstsorten. Das Messer ist sehr scharf, ich Schärfe es mit einem Rollenschleifer bei 15 Schleifwinkel.Das Messer ist gut ausgewogen und liegt auch ordentlich in der Hand. Auch der Griff ist pflegeleicht und sehr schön. Die Maserung der Klinge ist auch ein echter Hingucker. Dieses Messer ist mir ans Herz gewachsen, ich kann es nur empfehlen.

Wie üblich schnell geliefert. Das Messer wurde mit einem gut sitzenden Schneidenschutz geliefert, was einen problemlosen Aufenthalt in der Besteckschublade möglich macht. 😉. Eine gute Schärfe machen das Schneiden angenehm. Von mir eine Empfehlung
